mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (schedule_id, user_id, non_user_id, price, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{userId}, #{nonUserId}, #{price}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
INSERT INTO reservation_count (reservation_id, age_type, count, price) VALUES (#{reservationId}, #{ageType}, #{count}, #{price})
INSERT INTO reservation_seat (schedule_id, seat_id, created_at) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{seatId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT ss.schedule_id AS scheduleId, ss.screen_id AS screenId FROM screen_schedule ss WHERE ss.running_date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT s.seat_id AS seatId, s.screen_id AS screenId, s.row_label AS rowLabel, s.col_no AS colNo FROM seat s WHERE s.screen_id = #{screenId} AND s.is_delete = 0 ORDER BY s.row_label, s.col_no

SELECT r.reservation_id AS reservationId, r.schedule_id AS scheduleId, SUM(rc.count) AS personCount FROM reservation r JOIN reservation_count rc ON rc.reservation_id = r.reservation_id WHERE r.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND r.status IN (0, 1) GROUP BY r.reservation_id, r.schedule_id
